mapper.insert: insert into tb_article_comment(article_comment_id, article_id, user_id, content, like_num, create_time, status) SELECT #{id}, #{articleId}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{likeNum}, #{createTime}, #{status} where exists(select id from tb_article where id = #{articleId}) and exists(select id from tb_user where id = #{userId})
mapper.select: select tac.article_comment_id as comment_id, tac.content, tac.like_num, tac.create_time, tu.id as user_id, tu.username, tu.nickname, tu.avatar from tb_article_comment tac join tb_user tu on tac.user_id = tu.id where tac.article_id = #{id}

select tac.article_comment_id as comment_id, tac.content, tac.like_num, tac.create_time, tu.id as user_id, tu.username, tu.nickname, tu.avatar, if(ISNULL(tacl.user_id), false, true) as is_like from tb_article_comment tac join tb_user tu on tac.user_id = tu.id left join tb_article_comment_like tacl on tacl.comment_id = tac.article_comment_id and tacl.user_id = #{userId} where tac.article_id = #{id} order by tac.like_num desc limit #{current},#{size}
